text: Hej hej! I am trying to update the SEAL `build_tarballs.jl` in <https://github.com/JuliaPackaging/Yggdrasil/tree/master/S/SEAL|Yggdrasil> for the new v3.6 release of the SEAL library. Since 3.6 they do not bundle the dependencies with SEAL anymore but use CMake's `FetchContent` <https://cmake.org/cmake/help/latest/module/FetchContent.html|feature> to get and build them. However, this does not work in BB since there does not seem to be internet access from within a build environment. What's the recommended way to handle this in a sane way?

elements.text: Hej hej! I am trying to update the SEAL

uh?
